I want to…: Download new AI models to my device
So that…: I have model(s) that I can query
I know what models I can query

I want to…: Select an AI model to query
So that…: I can choose a specific model to query
I can do basic text queries
I can view all my existing sessions
I can remember what the session is about
I can come back to a session in the future
I can continue from where a previous session left off

I want to…: Uninstall AI models from my device
So that…: I can get rid of unused AI models
I can remove unnecessary or obsolete sessions

I want to…: Query AI using my active desktop display
So that…: I don't need to format the contents of my query before sending it nor use multiple applications

I want to…: Query AI using a snipped selection of my active desktop display
So that…: I can query based on a specific part of my display
I can take notes with the help of AI such as summarization
I can delete old or obsolete notes
I can understand the contents of a note at a glance

I want to…: Use multiple AI models in a single session
So that…: I can utilize the strengths of different models for different types of queries (text, image, etc)
